full_summary:
### Tender Notice 
#### Solicitation No. 2BH2129384/B

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police is soliciting bids for the supply of 1000 Jabra Biz 2300 USB Mono MS PTT Headsets, Noise Cancelling Microphone, over-the-head or equivalent, and 1000 Jabra Biz 2300 USB Stereo MS PTT Headsets, Noise Cancelling Microphone, over-the-head or equivalent.

### Contract Details

* Contract Title: SSC 2BH2129384/B - Jabra Biz 2300 USB MS Headsets or equivalent for Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* Department: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* Notification Period: 19 days (December 22, 2022 to January 9, 2023)
* Destination: Ottawa, ON
* Delivery Date: 60 federal government working days from contract award

### Tender Requirements

* The Contractor must provide 1000 Jabra Biz 2300 USB Mono MS PTT Headsets and 1000 Jabra Biz 2300 USB Stereo MS PTT Headsets, as per the List of Deliverables in the Request for Quotation.
* The Headsets must meet the requirements of over-the-head or equivalent.
* The Contractor must deliver the Headsets to the specified destination within the stipulated delivery date.

### Security Requirements

* This tender notice does not have any security requirements.

### Trade Agreements and Regulations

* This tender is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

### Contact Information

* Michael Boualavong, Junior Procurement Officer, Shared Services Canada
* Phone: (613) 402-8895
* Email: [michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:michael.boualavong@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Address: 400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2N1

### Submission Information

* Bids must be submitted only to the
